title: Depeche Mode: Tour of the Universe - Barcelona 20/21.11.09

sources.title: 2010 Barcelona
sources.description: With Andreas Koepnick, Dieter Oelrich, Andres Lewin Richter, Arturo Camus, Chungchong Lee, Cora Praatz, Dirk Vollenbroich, Friederike Mainka, Kai Kraatz, Kyong Paik, Stefan Sillies, Lutz Mommartz, the city of Barcelona and electronic music of the 50s. presented by Andreas Lewin Richter in the University of Barcelona. 10 years later mounted to a film. After my retirement in 1999 my successor Andreas KÃ¶pnick and his class invited me on a field trip to Barcelona. 10 years later mounted to a film. My motto: "Because it is part of each other, what does not fit with each other." (LUTZ MOMMARTZ)

metadata.Plot: Depeche Mode live footage filmed at Palau Sant Jordi in Barcelona, Spain on 20 and 21 November 2009 during the band's 2009-10 worldwide Tour of the Universe.
metadata.Actors: Dave Gahan, Martin Gore, Andrew Fletcher
